mapper.select: SELECT PO.OPT_NAME AS OPT_NAME, LISTAGG( PO.OPT_VALUE||'-'||PO.OPT_ID, ',' )WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PO.OPT_VALUE||'-'||PO.OPT_ID) AS OPT_VALUE FROM PROD_OPTION PO WHERE PO.PROD_ID = #{prod_id} GROUP BY PO.OPT_NAME
SELECT MAX(opt_id) AS max_opt_id FROM PROD_OPTION
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD_OPTION(opt_id, opt_name, opt_value, prod_id) VALUES(PROD_OPTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{opt_name}, #{opt_value}, #{prod_id})
